code: import{Splide,SplideSlide}from"@splidejs/react-splide";import"@splidejs/react-splide/css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Carousel=_ref=>{let{type,things,options}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Splide,{"aria-label":"infantry-class-slider",dir:"ltr",options:options,children:Array.isArray(things)&&things.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SplideSlide,{"data-splide-interval":"2000",children:type==="company"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.href,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.logo,alt:"company logo",className:"size-full h-32 object-contain"})}):type==="review"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"size-full card py-5",dir:"rtl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-end gap-x-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.avatar,alt:item.name,className:"size-20 max-md:hidden"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"text-start text-lg",children:[item.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-slate-300 text-[10px]",children:item.job})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"my-2 opacity-30"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-justify mt-3",children:item.review})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-slate-200 md:text-[10px] text-[8px] text-end mt-2",children:["\u0622\u062E\u0631\u06CC\u0646 \u0647\u0645\u06A9\u0627\u0631\u06CC : ",item.lastCooperation]})]})}):""},index);})});};export default Carousel;
